question: ‘World Day for the Prevention of Child Abuse’ is observed on which date?
explanation:
Leading non-governmental organization, the Women's World Summit Foundation (WWSF), launched the World Day for Prevention of Child Abuse on November 19, in the year 2000.
This is observed in synergy with the anniversary of the International Day for the rights of the child observed on 20 November. In 2001, an NGO coalition was formed to conduct events on November 19, every year.
